# File ../lib/sqlpostgres/PgTimeWithTimeZone.rb, line 57
    def initialize(hour = 0, minute = 0, second = 0, 
                   zone_hours = 0, zone_minutes = 0)
      @hour = hour
      @minute = minute
      @second = second
      @zone_hours = zone_hours
      @zone_minutes = zone_minutes
    end
